I believe that we should try to be very aware of our existence. We must be conscious of what it means to exist, what it means to be a live human being and what comes with this condition. I believe it shouldn’t be so hard to acknowledge that we are all living precarious lives and, because of that, we're inserted in a context of interdependence and colaboration. To be aware of our true existence is to be aware of the other's true existence; it is the first step to accept our own limitations and, in consequence, to accept the other’s. I believe that really knowing and understanding the fabulous complexity and the multiple consequences of the simple act of existing is our greatest challenge in this life. This is what will grant us the absolute awareness of our own humanity. This is what we'll call, someday, our essence. Well, that´s what I believe... yet, I realize it can be a large amount of bullshit.

Mais um Hoje foi um belo dia de ócio. Nada para se fazer, nada feito. Nem a cabeça com droga nenhuma, nada. Mas, ainda assim, foi um belo dia. Um dia como muitos que já passaram e como outros tantos que hão de passar... e passarão bem calmos, se deus quiser. Um dia que até agora não acabou e que ainda apresenta um monte de nada para se fazer. Um dia que foi útil no mundo todo - exceto talvez em algum remoto canto onde se jejuou perante uma imagem de um rinoceronte branco para se atingir a plena purificação da alma - para mim não passou de mais um dia... que vai passando. Passando. Passando modorrento como a vida toda, perante meus olhos como a vida toda, sem movimento como a vida toda, sem que eu me mova como na vida toda, mas belo, como só o ócio pode ser. Another one Today was a nice idle day. Nothing to do, nothing done. Not even my hair in some bad trip of any drug, nothing. Yet, it was a nice day. A day like many that have passed and much others to pass... and, lordolord, they'll pass quietly. A day that´s not over yet and which still has plenty of nothing to do. A normal week day for the whole world - except for maybe some distant place where people fasted before some white rhino sculpture in order to attain purification of their soul - to me was nothing more then another day... that's passing. Passing. Passing lazy as life, before my eyes as life, motionless as life, without me moving as in life, but nice, as leisure can be.

I made you a song, but won't sing it for you. I'm still trying to ask for your forgiveness, but am not that sure you're ready to give it to me. You're probably right and quite not ready to come back either... well, I know I´m not. I only think that we're too messed up without each other and do believe I'll be better off with you here, in my strange little world, yelling at me. The song I wrote didn't mention any of this, just remembered the nice times we spent together and the beautiful feelings we shared at those meandering hours. And, as a love song, it didn't tell only the truth; some lies were added to it, some deeds enhanced, some wrongs corrected. As a love song, it didn't work that well. So, I picked myself from the disposal and faced my fear, standing tall with my chin up, prepared for my well-deserved unforgettable slap.
